natural solution: Since 24 and 36 have a common factor of 12, we can simplify \[ \frac{24}{36}=\frac{2\cdot 12}{3\cdot 12}=\frac{2\cdot \cancel{12}}{3\cdot \cancel{12}}=\boxed{\frac{2}{3}}. \]
